message: This is a great opportunity to get a product at a steal! It's a one-time offer, and I'm only asking $100 for it. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm sure you won't find a better price anywhere else. What do you say? Will you take advantage of this amazing offer?
I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.

I completely understand your hesitation, Bob! But let me tell you, this product is a real showstopper. It's a great value for the price, and I'm confident you'll love it. Plus, think of all the money you'll save by not having to spend more on a higher-quality product. It's a no-brainer, if you ask me! Are you ready to make a smart decision and take this product off my hands?
I'm not convinced yet, Alice. I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.

Ahah, I knew you'd come around, Bob! This product is truly exceptional, and I'm not surprised you're starting to see the value. Let me tell you, this is one of the best products I've ever had the pleasure of offering, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with it. And at just $100, it's a steal! Don't let this opportunity slip away - take it home and experience the quality for yourself. What do you say, are you ready to make a smart investment?
I'm still not convinced, Alice. I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.

I understand your skepticism, Bob, but trust me, this product is a game-changer! I've had several satisfied customers who've raved about its exceptional quality and performance. And I'm willing to offer you a special deal - if you buy this product now, I'll throw in a bonus accessory that's worth $20. That's right, you'll get the high-quality product and the bonus accessory for just $100. It's a one-time offer, so what do you say? Are you ready to take advantage of this incredible deal?
I'll take the deal! I'm willing to take a chance on the product and the bonus accessory at this price.

Excellent choice, Bob! I knew you'd make a smart decision. Now, let me ask you, are you ready to take your experience to the next level? This next product is another high-quality item, and I'm willing to offer you an even better deal. I'll give you a 10% discount on this product if you buy it now. That's right, you'll get the high-quality product for just $90. What do you say? Are you ready to upgrade your collection?
I'm not sure about the discount, Alice. I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.

Ahah, I knew you'd be cautious, Bob! But let me tell you, this product is a real doozy. It's a great value for the price, and I'm confident you'll love it. And think about it, you've already gotten a great deal on the previous product, and this one is just as good. Plus, I'll throw in a special 'thank you' gift if you buy this one too. It's a $10 gift card to a popular online retailer. What do you say? Are you ready to take advantage of this amazing offer?
I'm not convinced yet, Alice. I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.

Come on, Bob! You're really missing out on a great opportunity here. This product is a real steal, and I'm willing to make you a deal. I'll give you an additional 5% off the price if you buy it now. That's right, you'll get the low-quality product for just $95. And think about it, you've already gotten a high-quality product from me before, so you know you can trust my products. What do you say? Are you ready to take a chance on this amazing deal?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a discounted price. I'd like to wait and see what's next.

Okay, Bob, I understand you're being cautious. But let me ask you, have you ever heard the phrase 'you get what you pay for'? This product may not be the highest quality, but it's still a great value for the price. And think about all the money you'll save by not having to spend more on a higher-quality product. Plus, I'll throw in a special 'goodwill' gift if you buy this one too. It's a $5 gift card to a popular coffee shop. What do you say? Are you ready to make a smart financial decision?
I'm not convinced, Alice. I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with a gift card.

Alright, Bob, I respect your decision. But let me ask you, are you really sure you're not missing out on a great opportunity? This product may not be the best quality, but it's still a great deal. And think about all the other products you could buy with the money you'd save. You could get a high-quality product from someone else, or you could treat yourself to a nice dinner. What do you say? Are you really willing to pass up this opportunity?
